__host__ __device__ bool komrade::operator!= ( const device_ptr< T1 > &  lhs,
const device_ptr< T2 > &  rhs 
) [inline]

Inequality comparison operator compares two device_ptrs with related types for inequality.

Parameters:
lhs The first device_ptr to compare.
rhs The second device_ptr to compare.
Returns:
true if and only if lhs's raw pointer does not equal rhs's raw pointer; false, otherwise.
